mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (seller_id, title, description, price, status, si_do, si_gun_gu, eup_myeon_dong, apartment_name) VALUES (#{sellerId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{price}, 'FOR_SALE', #{siDo}, #{siGunGu}, #{eupMyeonDong}, #{apartmentName})
mapper.select: SELECT si_do, si_gun_gu, eup_myeon_dong, apartment_name FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT p.product_id, p.seller_id, p.title, p.description, p.price, p.status, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.si_do, p.si_gun_gu, p.eup_myeon_dong, p.apartment_name FROM products p WHERE p.si_do = #{siDo} AND p.si_gun_gu = #{siGunGu} AND p.eup_myeon_dong = #{eupMyeonDong} AND p.apartment_name = #{apartmentName} AND p.status = 'FOR_SALE' ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
SELECT image_url FROM product_images WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY image_id ASC
